no.kartverket.bordergo

Class TangoService

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.app.Service
          • no.kartverket.bordergo.TangoService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2

    public class TangoService
extends android.app.Service
    Independent service handling the tango system, and the transformations between the tango system and external geographic coordinates. The TangoService should be independent of specific activities, as it us used by several, and we would like the Tango reference frames to persist when activities are started and stopped - destroyed and recreated.

    Created by runaas on 25.08.2017.
